Alias.name: start bashing
Alias.script: toggles.bashing = true cecho("<green>Bashing ON!") send(" ") waiting.ih = false do_bashing()

Alias.name: stop bashing
Alias.script: toggles.bashing = false cecho("<green>Bashing OFF!") if toggles.fasthunt then toggles.fasthunt = false echo("\nFasthunt OFF!") send(" ") else send(" ") end

Alias.name: gather
Alias.script: loot()

Alias.name: offer
Alias.script: offer_corpses()

Alias.name: load targets
Alias.script: possible_targets = {} target_type = "short" target_priority = 10000 for i in string.gmatch(matches[2], "(%w+)") do table.insert(possible_targets, i) end cecho("<green>Targets Received:") for h in ipairs(possible_targets) do cecho("\n "..possible_targets[h]) end send(" ")

Alias.name: generics
Alias.script: toggle("generics")

Alias.name: fastmode
Alias.script: toggle("fasthunt")

fishing mode
Alias.script: toggle("fishing")

Alias.name: bait type
distance
target
credits for sale
Alias.script: send("credits for sale")

Alias.name: diagnose
Alias.script: queue_diag()

Alias.name: reset
defense toggle
Alias.script: if defenses[matches[2]].needit then defenses[matches[2]].needit = false echo("No longer keeping "..matches[2]) send(" ") else defenses[matches[2]].needit = true echo("Now keeping "..matches[2]) send(" ") end

Alias.name: modifier
Alias.script: current_modifier = matches[2]

Alias.name: landmarks
Alias.script: if landmarks[matches[2]] ~= nil then send("path find "..landmarks[matches[2]]) else cecho("<green>No such landmark!") send(" ") end

Alias.name: defense options
Alias.script: load_def(matches[2])

Alias.name: stats
Alias.script: display(toggles) send(" ")

Alias.name: citytells
Alias.script: display(channels.citytells) send(" ")

Alias.name: ordertells
Alias.script: display(channels["ordertells"]) send(" ")

Alias.name: guildtells
Alias.script: display(channels.guildtells) send(" ")

Alias.name: markettells
Alias.script: display(channels.markettells) send(" ")

Alias.name: newbie tells
Alias.script: display(channels.newbietells) send(" ")

Alias.name: societytells
Alias.script: display(channels[current_society]) send(" ")

Alias.name: novice tells
Alias.script: display(channels.novicetells) send(" ")

Alias.name: focus body
Alias.script: send("focus body")

Alias.name: fleeing
Alias.script: if toggles.bashing then toggle("bashing") end if toggles.fasthunt then toggle("fasthunt") end set_attack("flee")

Alias.name: help
lead mount
Alias.script: send("lead "..my.mount)

Alias.name: mount
Alias.script: if can.vault then send("vault "..my.mount) else send("mount "..my.mount) end

Alias.name: dismount
Alias.script: send("dismount")

Alias.name: punch mount
Alias.script: set_attack("punch "..my.mount..";stop")

Alias.name: unwield
Alias.script: unwielding = true tempTimer(1, [[unwielding = false]]) send(matches[1])

Alias.name: get
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then do_pack(matches[1]) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: put
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then do_pack(matches[1]) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: probe
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then do_pack(matches[1]) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: open
Alias.script: if matches[2] == my.container then opening = true send(matches[1]) tempTimer(1, [[opening = false]]) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: remove
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then removing = true send(matches[1]) tempTimer(1, [[removing = false]]) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: moving
Alias.script: if toggles.marching and my.class == "soldier" then send("march "..matches[1]) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: save map
Alias.script: map_save() cecho("<green>Saving map!") send(" ")

Alias.name: room list
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "" then display_area = gmcp.Room.Info.area else display_area = matches[2] end for i in pairs(map) do if i == display_area or string.lower(i) == display_area then cecho("<green>Area: "..i) for h in pairs(map[i]) do cecho("\n<red> (<green>"..h.."<red>) <grey>"..map[i][h].name) end end end send(" ") --display(map[gmcp.Room.Info.area])

Alias.name: room find
Alias.script: cecho("<green>Rooms Matching: "..matches[2]) for i in pairs(map) do for h in pairs(map[i]) do if string.find(map[i][h].name, matches[2]) then cecho("\n<red> (<green>"..h.."<red>) <grey>"..map[i][h].name) if i ~= gmcp.Room.Info.area then cecho("<red> (<blue>"..i.."<red>)") end end end end send(" ")

Alias.name: area list
Alias.script: cecho("<green>Known Areas:") for i in pairs(map) do echo("\n "..i) end cecho("<green>\nTotal Areas: "..#map) send(" ")

Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then if matches[2] == "" then set_attack("pray for healing") else set_attack("pray for healing of " ..matches[2]) ally = matches[2] end need_heal = true end

Alias.name: blessings
Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then if matches[2] == "" then send("pray for glorious word") tempTimer(3.3, [[send("pray for radiant word")]] ) tempTimer(6.4, [[send("pray for illuminated word")]] ) tempTimer(9.6, [[send("pray for righteous word")]] ) tempTimer(12.79, [[send("pray for blessed word")]] ) else blessed = matches[2] send("pray for glorious word to "..blessed) tempTimer(3.3, [[send("pray for radiant word to "..blessed)]] ) tempTimer(6.4, [[send("pray for illuminated word to "..blessed)]] ) tempTimer(9.6, [[send("pray for righteous word to "..blessed)]] ) tempTimer(12.8, [[send("pray for blessed word to "..blessed)]] ) end end

Alias.name: full inferno
Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then send ("firecall inferno") tempTimer(4.1, [[send("firecall smokescreen on")]] ) tempTimer(6.2, [[send("firecall firewalls")]] ) tempTimer(12.6, [[send("firecall ashfall")]] ) tempTimer(16.8, [[send("firecall backdraft")]] ) tempTimer(21.7, [[send("firecall firerain")]] ) tempTimer(25.9, [[send("firecall fumes")]] ) end
